Main.speaker: Judge
Main.quote: Long time no see... Prosecutor Gavin. Were you taking a leave of absence?

Main.speaker: Richard Wellington
Main.quote: I am Richard Wellington, the Drifting Virtuoso with a Ph.D. in Drifting, as it were.

Main.speaker: April May
Main.quote: Well hello! I didn't expect anyone to visit me in such a dank place asthis... It's really quite... moving. Not!You stinking lawyer! I hope you die! Have you come to laugh? Yes, laugh at the fallen Miss May!

Main.speaker: Apollo Justice
Main.quote: You... might not want to advertise it like that.

Main.speaker: Angel Starr
Main.quote: The name is Angel Starr. Don't you go forgetting it. Or before you know it I'll have you whimpering at my heels.

Main.speaker: Ema Skye
Main.quote: So, to scientifically analyze the data available so far... You,Ms. Starr, are a lunch vendor with an ulterior motive for coming here!

Main.speaker: Marvin Grossberg
Main.quote: Hammond was a skilled defense attorney. But... he defended clients not for their sake, but for his own. [...] He never trusted his clients, that one. The only thing he trusted was his own ability.

Main.speaker: Klavier Gavin
Main.quote: You know that littlebandI started in my free time? Thing is, we got real popular. Hard to say nein to your fans when three of your singles go platinum, ja?

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: I...thank you, Your Honor.

Main.speaker: Beh'leeb Inmee
Main.quote: I will make amends by picking up where my husband left off. I will see the revolution through, so nothing like this can ever happen again! For that is the depth of my love for my dearly departed husband!

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: (This is not good... She's already captured the heart of every man in the court!)

Main.speaker: Moe
Main.quote: It's all Wright to be wrong every now and again,Wright?

Main.speaker: Herman Crab
Main.quote: ...Son of a gun.This little thingdoesn't let me get any sleep.

Main.speaker: Jinxie Tenma
Main.quote: The room was swimming in yokai! Kasha, Nurikabe, Setotaisho! Eeek! They were all there!

Main.speaker: Judge

Main.speaker: Judge
Main.quote: I've seen quite a few things in my many years on the bench. And in all that time, I've finally learned this one thing. Each case is different, and takes place in its own world, if you will. In order to fully understand that world, first we have to immerse ourselves in it completely.

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright

It is this fruit we receive, and pass on, and face in our time. And it is always changing, growing. Nurturing it is our task as human beings.

Main.quote: ...Wocky. Wake up and smell reality! [...] The signature on the chart, the engagement... I mean, come on! It's so obvious. Even for a brainless, spoiled brat such as yourself.

Main.speaker: Furio Tigre
Main.quote: Hey! Whad'youse think youse doin' wit my bike!? Gwoaaaaaaaaaar! Youse been messin' with my new ride? Is that what youse been doin'!?

Main.speaker: Franziska von Karma
Main.quote: You pathetic fool! I don't want to hear the wretched whimpering of a disgraced loser! A Von Karma is someone who is destined to be perfect!Miles Edgeworth... You are no longer worthy! You are no longer worthy of being a Von Karma! And neither am I!

Main.speaker: Kristoph Gavin
Main.quote: Common citizens? Wisdom? Is this some kind of joke? What could we possibly gain by doing this? Entrusting our judicial system to a mindless, emotional mob of irrational mouth-breathers?

Main.speaker: Judge
Main.quote: Mr. Wright. You are truly the most unpredictable defense attorney I've ever known.

Main.speaker: Franziska von Karma
Main.quote: Enough out of you... One more word and you'll get a mouthful of whip. Now. When did I ever bring up my papa's name in this, or any other conversation...?

Main.speaker: Winfred Kitaki
Main.quote: My apologies, Mr. Justice... He is usually such a nice boy.

Main.speaker: Spark Brushel
Main.quote: Eh? How do I feel about how things turned out? No Scoop Yet But Journalist's Confidence In Mint Condition, end quoooooote!

Main.speaker: Sergeant Buff
Main.quote: Youuuumaggots! Whattaya think yer doin', invadingBuff airspace?! It'll be a scorching day in Siberia before you get past me, ya yellow-bellied yahoos!

Main.speaker: Wesley Stickler
Main.quote: I have got to know the secret of your panties! My very existence depends on it!

Main.speaker: Lah'kee
Main.quote: I am Lah'kee, royal guard member and Her Eminence's shooooulder rubber!!!

Main.speaker: Mia Fey
Main.quote: I think one day, you'll understand, too. Phoenix, I want you to remember one thing... You were as good out there today as any defense lawyer could ever hope to be. There's nothing more you can learn from me. [...] You've accomplished something I wasn't able to. I owe you a great deal. ...Thank you. [...] I'm sure we'll meet again... someday... Phoenix.

Main.speaker: Damon Gant
Main.quote: Tell me, Worthy. What are you doing in court? You despise criminals. I can feel it. You and me... we're the same. One day you'll understand. If you want to take them on alone... you'll figure out what's needed!

Main.speaker: Tahrust Inmee
Main.quote: All who serve Her Holiness must strive to banish worldly desires from their soul! Open your heart! Let the Holy Mother in! Purge your mind of greed and bias!

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: (Hmm.  Why does it feel like she's just putting on an act?)

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: Well... They always say that love creates rivalries.

Main.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Main.quote: Wright. Listen, you need to know something. Juan Corrida was killed by Shelly de Killer. And the client who ordered the job... is Matt Engarde... Your own client.

Main.speaker: Ahlbi Ur'gaid
Main.quote: Mr. Rohl encouraged me to never give up. Ahlbi, you train hard and make sure you become a monk one day!  Don't end up like me, he'd say.

Main.speaker: Cody Hackins
Main.quote: What's that? Bo-ring! Man, how can one person be so lame!? Ifyouwere a superhero you'd be Lame-o-man!

Main.speaker: Acro
Main.quote: I mainly perform on the tightrope or the flying trapeze. But nowadays... All I perform in is my wheelchair.

Main.speaker: Simon Blackquill
Main.quote: ...............Hmph. ......Enough jabbering. Get on with it, already.

Main.speaker: Moe
Main.quote: How could anyone do that to such a wonderful man...!?

Main.speaker: Mimi Miney
Main.quote: But, it would be very hard to catch me. Actually, I'd say impossible. [...] I think you get the picture. I'm going to serve you a slice of humble pie! I hope you enjoy it. Ha ha ha...

Main.speaker: Dick Gumshoe
Main.quote: You know what I think about sometimes? What kind of life would I have if I hadn't joined the Homicide Division. [...] Me as a traffic cop. Me as a detention officer. Me as theBlue Badger...

Main.speaker: Jack Shipley
Main.quote: Forgive me, Marlon... I didn't realize what deep pain you were in... But, please... Please don't blame Orla. It's nobody's fault... Not Orla's... and not yours............

Main.speaker: Kristoph Gavin
Main.quote: Well, this case certainly has taken a turn... for the interesting!

Main.speaker: Dee Vasquez
Main.quote: And here I was worrying that today would be as boring as all the rest.... Very well. Let us have a battle of wits,youand I.

Main.speaker: Maya Fey
Main.quote: ...Mystic Ami. She's a Legendary Spirit Medium.

Main.speaker: Pees'lubn Andistan'dhin
Main.quote: Playing this tune here is a precious gig for me and my girl here, ya dig?

Main.speaker: Athena Cykes
Main.quote: Hey! Put a sock in it, Widget!

Main.speaker: Judge
Main.quote: I-I see... Hmm... Something is off with the two of you today. Youbothseem different somehow.

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: So they're brothers! That explains a lot...

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: R-right... sorry. (This girl is OUT there!)

Main.speaker: Klavier Gavin
Main.quote: Not to worry, Herr Judge. I wouldn't miss this day in court for the world. It's worth even more than VIP passes to one of my concerts, ja? How could I pass up a chance to see the true strength... ...of thelittle boywho bestedmy brother?

Main.speaker: Manfred von Karma
Main.quote: ...! Edgeworth!!!

Main.speaker: Jake Marshall
Main.quote: My brother couldn't have been killed byJoe Darke. I knew my brother better than anyone... No one could have beaten him in a fight.

Main.speaker: Sasha Buckler
Main.quote: When it's showtime, it's time to smile! That's what the captain always said.

Main.speaker: Myriam Scuttlebutt
Main.quote: Sss, sss, sss.

Main.speaker: Bonny de Famme
Main.quote: Yeah, my trick is turning some heads in the magic world right now. They're calling it new, miraculous magic. Some even say it's the real deal! Hee hee!

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: (Actually, I kind of can.)

Main.speaker: Pearl Fey
Main.quote: You... You're Mr. Nick, right? [...] I know who you are. You're... You're Mystic Maya's... special someone...

Main.speaker: Dick Gumshoe
Main.quote: We can't touch them. They've got too much moola. [...] No one stands up to Bruto Cadaverini. And I mean, no one!

Main.speaker: Desirée DeLite
Main.quote: I like to shop so much it makesRon's head spin!

Main.speaker: Judge
Main.quote: Should another case of this sort surface... ...we may have to consider an alternate system by which to administer justice.

Main.speaker: Yanni Yogi
Main.quote: I thought this was my chance, after 15 years, this was it! Finally, a chance to have my revenge on Robert Hammond and Miles Edgeworth... I have no regrets.

Main.speaker: Florent L'Belle
Main.quote: Why, if it isn't the mayor'slittlelawyers. What do YOU want with ME?

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: (A cute dog... And this will help us... how?)

Main.speaker: Mia Fey
Main.quote: (Is this guy sure about how he feels about ANYTHING?)

Main.speaker: Lisa Basil
Main.quote: I'm sorry. That data is SuPer Admin Restricted Desktop Access password-protected.

Main.speaker: Wendy Oldbag
Main.quote: Oh, he was the biggest star in the studio! [...] He shone the brightest! Back in the day.

Main.speaker: Marvin Grossberg
Main.quote: What does it really mean to have a relationship of mutual trust with the client? Perhaps it is we veteran lawyers who have lost sight of this.

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: Proof enough for you, Mr. Sahwit? Or should I say... Mr. Did It!

Main.speaker: Lotta Hart
Main.quote: I-I didn't mean anything bad! I know I can be a little mean, but I ain't evil!

Main.speaker: Ga'ran Sigatar Khura'in
Main.quote: Ho ho... May theHoly Mother's blessing be upon you.

Main.speaker: Roger Retinz
Main.quote: I'm telling you, man -- modern viewers eat this stuff up with a spoon! Trust me! All we gotta do is serve it up nice and hot. A feast for the eyes!

Main.speaker: Tahrust Inmee
Main.quote: ...Would this be the Twilight Realm? And what of this luxurious mane of hair...? Is it perhaps a gift from theHoly Mother, for decades of faithful service?!

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: (Léon the lion...RegentandRegina... Interesting name choices...)

Main.speaker: Phoenix Wright
Main.quote: (There is something very peculiar about this guy... Because I know it's not me...)

Main.speaker: Marvin Grossberg
Main.quote: Hewon that innocent verdictfor no one but himself.Yogiwas a free man, but socially, he was ruined.

Main.speaker: Apollo Justice
Main.quote: I find that shouting I'm fine! in a loud voice really relieves stress. It's part of my Chords of Steel workout, and a must before every trial.

Main.speaker: Cody Hackins
Main.quote: Waaaaaaaaaaaaah! Okay okay! Y-you're right! Th-the Steel Samurai f-fell down... Th-then he didn't m-move... Waaaaaaaaah!

Main.speaker: Maya Fey
Main.quote: I guess being born with the name Von Karma is a free pass to be arrogant and annoying.

Main.speaker: Dahlia Hawthorne
Main.quote: From the day I was born to the day I died, I never helped anyone! I lived for myself and, in the end, I died for myself. I thought that was obvious.

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: Is it... aclassroom?

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: (...But he IS a real detective...?)

Investigation.speaker: Simeon Saint
Investigation.quote: The most you can blame me for is writing the odd letter here and there. A quick note toRingerto tell her aboutWinner, another to him so he knew about her... But the fact that they wanted to kill each other, and one of them succeeded? That was all on them.

Investigation.speaker: Jacques Portsman
Investigation.quote: How about a handshake to seal the deal?

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: Poor little dog, slowly coming to resemblehis handler.

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: I believe the proper phrase here is, you fail.

Investigation.speaker: Excelsius Winner
Investigation.quote: When you get to my level, you don't uncover the truth. You make it, little by little.

Investigation.speaker: Wendy Oldbag
Investigation.quote: I thoughthewas trying to avoid me,youknow.

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: You...! Is not every life precious!?

Investigation.speaker: Quercus Alba
Investigation.quote: These crimes you all speak so seriously of... To me, this has all been nothing more than a game. You may chase me out of this embassy with your accusations... but it's no big deal.Allebahsthas numerous other embassies in other countries around the world. All you would accomplish is you would change the backdrop of our little game!

Investigation.speaker: Eddie Fender
Investigation.quote: What, like they tied the Broncster up in here to teach him a lesson!? Check out those powers of deduction! A pat on the head for our genius prosecutor!

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: I will never accept you as the Steel Samurai!

Investigation.speaker: Hilda Hertz
Investigation.quote: Don't you worry 'bout me. I can take it.Youjust tell me everythin', child.

Investigation.speaker: Buddy Faith
Investigation.quote: T-That may be true, but why...? Why go this far?

Investigation.speaker: Manfred von Karma
Investigation.quote: I... was careless.

Investigation.speaker: Manfred von Karma
Investigation.quote: Chief Prosecutor... I am sorry.

Investigation.speaker: Florence Niedler
Investigation.quote: No need to worry! It's nothing an injection can't cure! Now roll up your sleeve for me! It won't hurt! Much!

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: (I wouldn't bet money on our dear captain to be much of a reputable person.)

Investigation.speaker: Jacques Portsman
Investigation.quote: Man, what a piece of workthat guyis. Come on Jim.  We'd better catch up.

Investigation.speaker: Eddie Fender
Investigation.quote: Huh? Oh, this room? Non, non, dude. What do YOU know about it? I'll give you three choices:

Investigation.speaker: Cammy Meele
Investigation.quote: *yawn* I'm awake, I'm awake........................zzz.

Investigation.speaker: Amelie Fenn
Investigation.quote: ... Hi,Di-Jun. Sorry -- President Wang. It's me. Amelie. I know it's been a while... I... saw on the news that you were visiting this country soon. And I didn't know whether I should get in touch at all, but... in the end I decided I had to.

Investigation.speaker: Tyrell Badd
Investigation.quote: Like I told you... we're connected through the victim of KG-8 Incident, her younger sister. I was supposed to protect her... but I failed in my duties; just another pathetic detective... After that... Coachen's not guilty verdict... sparked our pursuit of the case. Me as detective, and she as a lawyer.

Investigation.speaker: Kay Faraday
Investigation.quote: Sounds like someone doesn't know the meaning of the phrase inner monologue, huh?

Investigation.speaker: Eustace Winner
Investigation.quote: Though you might know me as just THE Winner -- a name they call me down at the Prosecutor's Office. With GREAT affection, I might add.

Investigation.speaker: Di-Jun Wang
Investigation.quote: ...No. W-Wait-- this is my first chance to meethim! And it might be my only chance! Please -- give me just a few minutes longer!

Investigation.speaker: Kay Faraday
Investigation.quote: Even in the depths of night, when no other bird dares to take flight, one alone soars to shine the light of righteousness on the world's blight! And that one is me! For I am the Great Thief, Yatagarasu!

Investigation.speaker: Byrne Faraday
Investigation.quote: Areyousaying... that I'm theYatagarasu?

Investigation.speaker: Samson Tangaroa
Investigation.quote: She never thinks about what she wants. What she likes. ...I just want her to be her own person and to choose her own destiny. The last thing I want is for her to miss out on all that life has to offer because of me.

Investigation.speaker: Tabby Lloyd
Investigation.quote: Uh, sure... I'm your friendly neighborhood reporter!

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: My father followed his own path. Right to the end. And now I follow a path of my own making, too. ...But not alone. I have some... colorful companions to help me. As long as they're beside me, I won't lose my way. It's a new path. And a new me.

Investigation.speaker: Eddie Fender
Investigation.quote: No hard feelings, yeah? C'mon, bring it in!

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: ............(...So all the options he gave me were wrong. How infantile.)

Investigation.speaker: Simeon Saint
Investigation.quote: But then who should come through with the turnabout to end all turnabouts? The greatest legal mind of his generation! My knight in shining armor! I bet it felt pretty good saving me like that, huh?

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: The reason for my eagerness is my want to pursue the truth, and my want to believe in the strength of those who use the power of the law for good. As someone who has chosen to live my life as a prosecutor... that is my new creed.

Investigation.speaker: Alf Aldown
Investigation.quote: Hey,Rosie. It's me. I guess you're asleep already. Anyway, I'm here atthe orphanage. Something weird's going on.President Wangis here for some reason. And there's another-- Dammit! The light's out, so I can't quite see, but... ...it looked like he was being... kidnapped? Anyway, probably nothing, but I thought I should let you kn--

Investigation.speaker: Hilda Hertz
Investigation.quote: Danged right! We ain't just in the business o' fixin' bodies, Missy! The mind's where it all begins!

Investigation.speaker: Florence Niedler
Investigation.quote: Prevention is better than cure! A stitch in time saves nine! Those are just a few of my mottos!

Investigation.speaker: Di-Jun Wang (body double)
Investigation.quote: You know how many times I've nearly been killed? Not once. Not twice. A bunch of times! Why do I have to take all the risks? Why am I the one they always put in danger? When I'm out there beinghim, people treat me like I WAS him. They worship me. So what's the difference? Who's to say I couldn't be just as good as him?

Investigation.speaker: Excelsius Winner
Investigation.quote: I'm sorry, but you will have to be penalized. I've covered for you in the past, but not this time.

Investigation.speaker: Quercus Alba
Investigation.quote: The arm of the law is powerless before me!

Investigation.speaker: Larry Butz
Investigation.quote: She's the one with the hots for me! I just know it! I can feel her sexy beam piercing my heart when she's watching me! Seeeeeexy beam, I tell you!

Investigation.speaker: Simeon Saint
Investigation.quote: No, no, no! That was all Bronco's idea. Nothing to do with me at all. Still, it moved things in the right direction, wouldn't you say? Isn't fate a crazy thing?

Investigation.speaker: Quercus Alba
Investigation.quote: Heh heh heh... Do you really need me to answer that for you?

Investigation.speaker: Ernest Amano
Investigation.quote: No, no, no. Think nothing of it. Asyouknow,Manfredand I go way back. I consider a beloved disciple of his to be like one of my own blood.

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: (That was no misjudgment on your part! That's PRECISELY what I was trying to do!)

Investigation.speaker: Bodhidharma Kanis
Investigation.quote: If I'm honest,Mr. Edgeworth, I'm tired of all the killing. Keh heh heh. But back then, I felt that death was my path. I embraced it, and strove to learn what it had to teach.

Investigation.speaker: Eddie Fender
Investigation.quote: C'mon, Kaymeister. Don't let this clown get you down. He's projecting, plain and simple.Painting other folks with his own grubby brush. It's not just that he doesn't trust other people. The poor kid doesn't even understand the concept. Doing something for somebody else's sake? Forget about it. He'll never understand.

Investigation.speaker: Simeon Saint
Investigation.quote: .........Ohhh. So that's how you want to play it, huh? You always did have the courage of your convictions, I guess. Luckily, grinding people's self-belief into dust is kind of a hobby of mine.

Investigation.speaker: Colias Palaeno
Investigation.quote: All I wish for is the normalization of relationships between ourtwocountries. But there isone personstanding in the way of that dream.

Investigation.speaker: Tyrell Badd
Investigation.quote: ...Do I need to teachyoua thing or two about how to talk to adults, kid!?

Investigation.speaker: Bodhidharma Kanis
Investigation.quote: Let us just say that I might not take thelossof the onelifethat I eversavedtoo well.

Investigation.speaker: Calisto Yew
Investigation.quote: Did you know? Laughter is the best medicine,Edgeworth. Don't you get tired of making a serious face all the time?

Investigation.speaker: Kay Faraday
Investigation.quote: Grr, I toldyouto stop being mean toGummy!!!

Investigation.speaker: Bodhidharma Kanis
Investigation.quote: There was a difference, of course. Even if he did look and sound exactly like him. Keh heh. Just because it walks and talks like a president, that doesn't make it a president, does it,boy? Nooo.

Investigation.speaker: Eddie Fender
Investigation.quote: So the famousFrenchsculptor wasn't a Frenchman after all, huh.

Investigation.speaker: Excelsius Winner
Investigation.quote: Oh-ho-ho. Well, Miles, my boy, time to pay the piper. Ahh, I've always wanted to say that.

Investigation.speaker: Ernest Amano
Investigation.quote: As a butler, he's outstanding. He even serves asLance's personal private tutor.

Investigation.speaker: Excelsius Winner
Investigation.quote: If you never even realized that much, there's no hope for you, I'm afraid. None at all. You're no son of mine. Even you must see that.

Investigation.speaker: Bronco Knight
Investigation.quote: Yeah, well I'm doing my job as a knight and protecting myking. So go ahead. Keep runningyourmouth.

Investigation.speaker: Zinc Lablanc
Investigation.quote: I have to explain!? Unbelievable... I will say it once and only once. I do not have even a second to waste! Time is money as they say!

Investigation.speaker: Judge
Investigation.quote: Egads!  I've been overruled!?

Investigation.speaker: Eddie Fender
Investigation.quote: Now, let's see what the answer key has to say, shall we? Oh no! You got it wrong! This is actually... aworkshop!

Investigation.speaker: Shelly de Killer
Investigation.quote: You were a pawn to his queen, my young friend.

Investigation.speaker: Colias Palaeno
Investigation.quote: It's been 10 years. Manny recovered personally fromthat case, and dove enthusiastically into this job. He was the one who planned this event, and was to overseethis embassy's renovations. It really is a shame. He had such a bright future ahead of him.

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: In a situation like this... what would that man do...? What would he who can turn any desperate situation around do...? .........Turn it around...? That's it! I must turn my way of thinking around!

Investigation.speaker: Excelsius Winner
Investigation.quote: von Karma! It's not like you to make this kind of error... I never would have thought that Edgeworth would be the one to catch you.

Investigation.speaker: Gregory Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: ............ (He seems quite sincere.) Alright. I'm going to take you at your word.

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: (I guess Lang Zi had a lot to say in life, and on a lot of mundane topics as well...)

Investigation.speaker: Simeon Saint
Investigation.quote: B-But... one of them's a prosecutor, right? Aren't they all super scary!? All they do is stare at you... Right into your soul!

Investigation.speaker: Buddy Faith
Investigation.quote: Yeah.

Investigation.speaker: Shi-Long Lang
Investigation.quote: Lang Zisays: A cub who disrespects others soon feels the disciplinary bite of an elder.

Investigation.speaker: Shi-Long Lang
Investigation.quote: I've lost my minions, andyou'velost your fancy title.But it seems neither of us is prepared to give up on this investigation. Now, seeing as we're both so stubborn, how about we go head-to-head and thrash out the details?

Investigation.speaker: Lance Amano
Investigation.quote: I really don't remember much anymore... Honest... But if I don't tellyouat least something, you won't believe me at all, will you?

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: Kay, please, I'm begging you. By all means, do not provoke her any further...

Investigation.speaker: Miles Edgeworth
Investigation.quote: Ngh! (He certainly doesn't pull any punches!)

Great.speaker: Vilen Borshevik
Great.quote: I came toLondonto sight-see. I will be heading to seeCrystal Towerafter this.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Albert Harebrayne
Great.quote: I'm afraid I couldn't tell you, Mr Naruhodo. But, but as soon as I remember the magnificent genius's name, you'll be the first to know!
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Barok van Zieks
Great.quote: Those eyes please me. ...Nipponese. They shroud your fear, your doubt, your trepidation... They run wild, clinging to some phantom notion of courage. The quintessential look...of a sacrificial lamb.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Juror 2
Great.quote: Allow me to dispose of the rubbish, as per my master's orders.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: William Shamspeare
Great.quote: Out, out, brief candle! Life is but a walking shadow... A poor player that struts and frets his hour upon the stage... and then is heard no more.
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Albert Harebrayne
Great.quote: 'No scientist can find the truth without first finding self-belief...' Those were the words of a certain scientist I hold in the very highest esteem!
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Susato Mikotoba
Great.quote: Susato Mikotoba, judicial assistant to thedefense.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Ryunosuke Naruhodo
Great.quote: I will become a lawyer. I have to.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band

Great.speaker: Judge (British Empire)
Great.quote: As a member of the judiciary, I have been following the proceedings from the gallery. And I must say...I shan't ever forget the extraordinary battle between good and evil that I witnessed here today. Thedarknessthat has blighted justice inour landthese past ten years has at last been dispelled. Thanks, in no small part, to the efforts of abright young starfromthe East.
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Seishiro Jigoku
Great.quote: I find the defendant,Ryunosuke Naruhodo... guilty!
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Klint van Zieks
Great.quote: I will not here discourse the corruption rife among the aristocracy, which is to me, as one of them, so apparent.”
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Maria Gorey
Great.quote: We open up the dead to find the truth.
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Juror 6
Great.quote: Oh, don't mind me, my dears! I'll just be getting on with my knitting. Must finish these mitts for my grandson.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Gotts
Great.quote: Mein name ist Wilhelm Gottsreich Sigismond Ormstein. I have come to see ze Great Exhibition all ze vay from my home inBohemia. ...I'm very rich.
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Ryunosuke Naruhodo
Great.quote: ...Words that are causing me a lot of trouble. Who is this scientist?
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Juror No. 3
Great.quote: The stinking rich are always guilty of something! You - Hyuurgh! mark my words!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Susato Mikotoba
Great.quote: Trust me, it's not as if I don't want to believe you. But I can't think of any other way that this crime could have been committed.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band

Great.speaker: Bif Strogenov
Great.quote: You like to speak with your long English words and explain your clever ideas. But I am sailor. And sailors don't listen to long, boring stories. We don't believe. Sailors like me, we trust only what we see with our own eyes.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band

Great.speaker: Ashley Graydon
Great.quote: Even now, years later, the nightmares of my life in the slums wake me in the small hours. I wanted to drown them out. With more money than anyone who lived in that squalor could ever imagine.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Albert Harebrayne
Great.quote: 'No scientist should strive to protect himself more than he strives to protect the truth...' More words of the same great scientist, you know!
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Sandwich
Great.quote: There's, there's really n-n-nothing to me. Empty in the head, I am. Just two slices with no middle.
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Esmeralda Tusspells
Great.quote: He has become quite a celebrity inLondon, being the winner of no less than three policing awards last year. I simply had to make a model of the man.
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Genshin Asogi
Great.quote: Kazuma... The truth is shrouded in darkness. A darkness only our clan's great sword can pierce.
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Juror 4
Great.quote: I have recorded the entire conversation thus far, and have given it a logical appraisal.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Selden
Great.quote: Looks like...I'm gonna snuff it... before they get to stretch me neck... Listen... I wantyouto 'ave me loot. Anyfin'... to stopthe coppersgettin' their mitts on it... It's 'idden in the room...where I was lodgin' when they got me. 'Ere...this is the key to it. ...Take it. Always stay one step ahead, mate. See you in 'ell, I guess...Shamspeare.
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Raiten Menimemo
Great.quote: Sometimes stories call out to me, sometimes I have to chase them down, but either way you've got to be fast! Fast legs to run with, and a fast hand to write with! It's no good if you don't note it down, I always say! That's what I call...my Menimemoism!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney

Great.speaker: Juror 5 (young girl)
Great.quote: Um, we 'ave to listen to what's said onboth sides'the fence, and um...then settle on one... That's it, isn't it?
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Taketsuchi Auchi
Great.quote: ......... 'Sprig of my topknot...the time is right for farewell... Hope is lost forever.'
Great.source: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney

Great.speaker: Olive Green
Great.quote: I am truly... so sorry. Of course I'd getstabbed in the back with a knife.
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: William Shamspeare
Great.quote: Behold, you have only to rearrange the letters of my name to see that 'me's a seraph'! An angel, indeed!
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Iyesa Nosa
Great.quote: Affirmative! The enemy unit was seen attacking the foreigner in what can only be described as an act of war! Sir! It was that black-uniformed rogue infantryman over there who unloaded his firearm, sir!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Ryunosuke Naruhodo
Great.quote: And we really have no way of knowing... what'sfactand what'sfiction.
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Soseki Natsume
Great.quote: Relentlessly Racked by Remorse and Regret! ...Relentlessly racked by remorse and regret, I am...
Great.source: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney

Great.speaker: Stronghart
Great.quote: I would like to address all the good lords, ladies and gentlemen of the judiciary here present. You all know of these darker recesses in our great capital. And deep down, I believe you also know... ...that to fight those who dwell there requires at least some of us to occupy the darkness ourselves.
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Bif Strogenov
Great.quote: Next time I have to throw you out, I show you where lobsters spend winter! Understand?
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band

Great.speaker: Mael Stronghart
Great.quote: Great Britain'scapital cityis nothing but magnificent! London is the centre of the modern world!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Satoru Hosonaga
Great.quote: I strive to carry out all investigations flawlessly. It's my guiding principle.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Adron B. Metermann
Great.quote: ...I accept! All in the name of Altamont!!
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Eggert Benedict
Great.quote: Then I shall bid you farewell. ...Say goodbye to style.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Barok van Zieks
Great.quote: ...Pray forgive the discourtesy of filling my hallowed chalice whilst I stand accused of murder.
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Iris Wilson
Great.quote: The tea's brewed! And I have a freshly baked cake as well!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Vilen Borshevik
Great.quote: I am ballistics expert. I have seen many shootings. There is nothing I do not know about guns.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Yujin Mikotoba
Great.quote: In that case, I'm sureyouunderstand... that there are some confidential matters I cannot divulge to you.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney

Great.speaker: Yujin Mikotoba
Great.quote: I shall be very interested to see the fruits ofyourstudies over thepast year.
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Klint van Zieks
Great.quote: There is no path back to the light. Be it I or my dear friend Asogi who dies this night…I am eternally damned. To my extortioner, Mael Stronghart…may you feel the jaws of the beast at your throat every time you swallow.”
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Enoch Drebber
Great.quote: It's the addle-brained mock scientists that are the worst, you know. They don't recognise the fact that they don't have talent. They can't even get that right.
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Kazuma Asogi
Great.quote: In other words, our feeble government is scared of upsetting England’s policy makers. And you’re a convenient and expendable scapegoat to blame for this crime.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Vilen Borshevik
Great.quote: It is not good to judge based on what you see.Thosebrothersdid no wrong.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Quinby Altamont
Great.quote: Gas is the hope which shall light up the approaching new world. Therefore it must be utilized correctly!
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Juror 5
Great.quote: A fair and convenient single price. Just the way London's carriages should be operated!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Tobias Gregson
Great.quote: Gina... The truth is, I'm not the upstandin' fellow you think I am. You might be a diver at heart, but it's a good heart. You've reminded me I need to be true to myself. I've got one more job to take care of before it's ta-ta toLondontown for the foreseeable. And then I've gotta complete your education in the art of detection 'à la' Gregson, as they say.
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Kyurio Korekuta
Great.quote: That lamentable day...the preciousHoei kobanwas lost to me. No doubt some unscrupulous scoundrel pocketed the prize coin for himself!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Iris Wilson
Great.quote: ...Well yes.
Great.source: The Return of the Great Departed Soul

Great.speaker: Genshin Asogi's Will
Great.quote: Pg. 1I, Genshin Asogi, hereby request that upon my death, any and all material possessions and wealth belonging to me in London be delivered to my son, Kazuma Asogi, in the Empire of Japan.Pg. 2It is with deep sadness that I accept my fate in this foreign land, in the knowledge that I will never see my homeland or family again. But I regret nothing about my chosen path.Pg. 3Kazuma... The truth is shrouded in darkness. A darkness only our clan's great sword can pierce.Mighty Karuma,Twist thy head and watch them fall,All thy mortal foes!
Great.source: The Resolve of Ryunosuke Naruhodo

Great.speaker: Ryunosuke Naruhodo
Great.quote: Anyway, you have to believe me! I'm not the real culprit!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Rei Membami
Great.quote: How dare you?!Susatois every bit as gallant and dashing as any of your Tokyo attorneys! I won't have you making fun of her!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Blossoming Attorney

Great.speaker: Ryunosuke Naruhodo
Great.quote: I will stop at nothing to protect my client! I don't care who I make an enemy of!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Sholmes
Great.quote: I was a callow fellow back then. A mere shadow of the great detective you see before you now.
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Sandwich
Great.quote: I'm a th-thinker, me. Think all sorts of thoughts. I think, therefore I am. I am, therefore I think. Because I stand there on the street, w-watchin' the w-world go on about me, they call  me 'The Observator'.
Great.source: Twisted Karma and His Last Bow

Great.speaker: Soseki Natsume
Great.quote:
I've travelled halfway around the world to learn about these people's country and its great history!
But no one wants to listen to a man with a strange accent. They all hate me!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Ryunosuke Naruhodo
Great.quote: (Who?! Who's responsible for choosing this man as a juror...?)
Great.source: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

Great.speaker: Juror No. 3
Great.quote: I don't like the stinking rich. Never have. They're always up to something or other that they shouldn't be. Every one of them. Andthat little leprechaun of a manis no exception. Well...he can't fool me!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

Great.speaker: Duncan Ross
Great.quote: I'll be alright. I promised we'd graduate before you introduce me to your parents, remember?
Great.source: The Memoirs of the Clouded Kokoro

Great.speaker: Kazuma Asogi
Great.quote: I want to bring about change in our own legal system. That's why I haveto cross the oceanto seethe real thingwith my own eyes.
Great.source: The Adventure of the Great Departure

Great.speaker: Juror 1
Great.quote: I've been long ready to hand down punishment to evil scoundrels!
Great.source: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
